alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Susana Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 25 at 2:17PM PST until November 26 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Santa Susana Mountains, Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, and Western San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Susana Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
